networks.Element.Element¶

class networks.Element.Element(name)¶

Bases: ABC

An abstract base class representing an element in a network.

__init__(name)¶

Initializes an Element object.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the element.

Methods

__init__(name)

Initializes an Element object.

get_name()

Get the name of the element.

get_property()

Abstract method to get a property of the element.

set_name(n)

Set the name of the element.

set_property()

Abstract method to set a property of the element.
get_name()¶

Get the name of the element.

Returns:

The name of the element.

Return type:

str

abstract get_property()¶

Abstract method to get a property of the element.

This method must be implemented by subclasses.

Raises:

NotImplementedError – If not implemented by subclass.

set_name(n)¶

Set the name of the element.

Parameters:

n (str) – The new name for the element.

abstract set_property()¶

Abstract method to set a property of the element.

This method must be implemented by subclasses.

Raises:

NotImplementedError – If not implemented by subclass.
